text:
“Cannabis isn’t an entrance drug. It’s an exit drug from pharmaceuticals, narcotics, alcohol, and nicotine.” @DrUmaSays’s talk is essential viewing. Watch it now at https://t.co/rC2jNRGDht. It's free.
